__e: Your sister lied, and we've all been living in the shadow of that lie for twenty years, you most of all.

Rest assured that this will be the last time you were ever outshined by a Jew. I must be going.
I was thinking I stay here I'd be living in the shadow of someone else.
I have to start by saying that if there was any other way, if there was even a slight chance of another alternative, I would give anything not to be here with you now, anything.
We all live in its shadow and almost none of us know it.

I'm tired of living in your shadow.

The Shadow's as far from human as it gets.
And do you know what the shadow is?
